scripts.build:aot:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:aot && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:prod && docker build -t angular2-webpack-start:latest .
scripts.ci:aot: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:jit: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:nobuild: npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:testall: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:travis: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e:travis
scripts.clean: npm cache clean && npm run rimraf -- node_modules doc coverage dist compiled dll
scripts.lint: npm run tslint "src/**/*.ts -e src/app/e2e/**/* -e src/app/view/components/rule-engine/**/* -e src/app/api/util/CwFilter.spec.ts -e src/app/view/components/semantic/elements/input-text/* -e /app/api/rule-engine/* -e src/app/api/system/locale/I18n.it-spec.ts -e src/app/api/validation/Check.spec.ts -e src/app/api/rule-engine/Action.it-spec.ts -e src/app/api/services/bundle-service.it-spec.ts -e src/app/api/util/DevUtil.ts -e src/main.browser.aot.ts -e src/app/view/components/semantic/elements/input-date/demo.ts -e src/app/api/rule-engine/Rule.it-spec.ts -e src/app/api/persistence/ApiRoot.spec.ts"
scripts.publish-dotcms-ui: npm run build:pack && cd dist && npm publish && cd /
